about.summary: Jinja2 Extension for Dates and Times

name: jinja2-time
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}
{% set gh_org = "hackebrot" %}
{% set gh_repo = "jinja2-time" %}

package:
  name: {{ gh_repo }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ gh_repo }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/{{ gh_org }}/{{ gh_repo }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0e647e525ba47523fa400a58fdec090b1cc6dcec4afbf095ee01e9e589e5a5ef

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - arrow
    - jinja2
    - python

test:
  requires:
    - freezegun
    - pytest
    - python
  commands:
    - py.test {{ environ["SRC_DIR"] }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/{{ gh_org }}/{{ gh_repo }}
  license: MIT
  summary: Jinja2 Extension for Dates and Times

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
